title: FS:  Nice SGC 30 Red Murray T 204 Ramly
author: GrayGhost

posts.post_title: FS:  Nice SGC 30 Red Murray T 204 Ramly
posts.post_content:
Well, when I used to collect cards, this was one of three I really liked and kept, along w a Gorgeous SGC A Cracker Jack and an SGC 40 T201 Cicotte. But, time to sell, sadly, so I can put a bit in bank and do something till my new job starts soon

I chose as the one to sell this T 204 RED MURRAY SGC 30

 I would like to get 100.00 for this Card, which includes shipping Priority/insured/Delivery confirmation. I checked ebay and that seems to be a fair price for a Ramly. Anyone who would like the card. PM ME TO RESERVE. THANK YOU. Scott.

 

Also, most of smudges u see are from a scanner bed that needs cleaning. holder is pretty clear. NICE CARD
Only bump, I do need to sell this nice card and don't be scared to PM me a fair offer.;)

[quote name="GrayGhost" post=1016259]Only bump, I do need to sell this nice card and don't be scared to PM me a fair offer.;)[/QUOTE]

Not telling you what to do by any means but you might have better luck if you put a price on it. Myself and many other members don't care to do offers too often. Just a thought and good luck with it. (I am all set on Ramly types)....best regards

Thanks Leon. I shall do that. Makes sense.

CARD IS NOW FOR SALE: original post has been edited to reflect. and Thanks
ONLY price drop on this Great card. UP To you guys:)
